resources.string:
Welcome to Mermaid's Quest, the ultimate underwater action game!

 The beautiful mermaid needs your help!
 She needs to collect gold coins in order to pay the ransom for her kidnapped sister!

 Help her by steering her through the underwater maze!
 Move her in all directions by wiping the screen!
 If you find all coins in a level, you advance to the next level!

 Beware of the evil jellyfish - they will try to catch and hurt you!
 If your health is 0 you DIE!
 Good Luck!
